subject: Football
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Chris Demarest, the assistant head football coach at Rutgers, was arrested early Saturday and charged with assaulting a woman after an incident at a bar in Long Branch, N.J.
snippet: Chris Demarest, the assistant head football coach at Rutgers, was arrested early Saturday and charged with assaulting a woman after an incident at a bar in Long Branch, N.J.
